channel.title: Why the fuck do people like PI bases
channel.description: I've been off mopar for about 6 months and I'm just coming back to programming but I need to know why people insist on using PI bases? It's absolute shit tbh. I'm just freaking saying, I'd rather work on a laggy delta any day.

item.title: Why the fuck do people like PI bases
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

[quote=“Viety, post:3, topic:419881”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=522418.msg3799001#msg3799001 date=1319866461]
Because they can pack as many shitty customs into it as they want
[/quote]
Baha so you’re in other words telling me, we no longer have any REAL programmers?[/quote]
Yes. Have you taken a look at the ssp? 100% PI loading this bla bla korasi claws join. It makes me sick.

Read full topic
item.source: Why the fuck do people like PI bases

item.title: Why the fuck do people like PI bases
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

PI is insanly easy and a lot of the players on servers like the newer items. I personally don’t like PI, but I discovered you have a more successful server if its a PI. I don’t understand really, but David is also right. It is easy to code, and the framework itself was programmed without an IDE, so its pretty unstable and has lots of warnings. PI’s take a lot of work to make stable(ish).

Read full topic
item.source: Why the fuck do people like PI bases

[/quote]
Baha so you’re in other words telling me, we no longer have any REAL programmers?[/quote]

  • people keep making tuts for them and shitting out 317 loading 9682358234523852386326 PIs.
